English: Salvage Drones
A pack of autonomous retrieval drones that scour the battlefield, securing all items even when the area remains contested. All items left on the ground are collected on mission end.
Ezekiel's Dream
A reinforced hard-point harness that lets any aircraft carry a ground vehicle as external cargo. Aircraft can carry a vehicle for 1 space (Thunderbird can carry 2 vehicles for 1 space each).
Signal Harvester
A jumble of antenna arrays to listen in on other people's conversations. Gives Scan Ability, with 50% chance of detecting POI.
Barracuda Berths
Reconfigures the Manticore’s hold into two extra passenger pods, at the cost of some speed. Adds 2 passenger seats, –200 Speed
Neurorest Hammocks
A set of mesh slings with IV drips and brain-wave modulators, because we all deserve a natural rest. Operatives on board recover a small amount of Stamina.
Lightning Strike Precision Ordnance
Precision-guided munitions system that allows to call down targeted explosive strikes in open air locations.
Argus Array
Military-grade sensor suite that enhances point-of-interest detection on the Geoscape and heightens operative perception in combat.
Hephaestus Workshop
An engineering bay that repairs bionics and vehicle systems and enhances their resilience by integrating the latest technological breakthroughs.
Daedalus Overdrive Suite
An automation-driven overdrive package that installs redundant subsystems and precision diagnostics, leveraging advanced automation to maximize range, speed, and airframe resilience.
Boreas Purger
A variant of the Mist Repeller designed to be aircraft mounted.
Proteus Matrix

An AI that forecasts optimal concealment tactics and likely threat vectors to guide operatives. Its predictive accuracy naturally degrades over time, capping its benefits to the mission’s opening phase.
Panacea Nexus
A bio-nanite infusion chamber that bathes operatives in regenerative swarms and primes them for battle.
Helios Engine upgrade: Overclocked Fusion Catalyst +100 Speed
Helios Engine upgrade: Magnetic Plasma Vortex Nozzles +100 Speed
Helios Engine upgrade: Icarus Net +100 Speed
Helios Engine upgrade: Gravitic Resonance Assist +100 Speed
Sanctum of the Veil
Aetheric chamber that prepares the Anointed for symbiosis with the Mist.
Mutog Menagerie
A space-saving organic containment module. Aircraft may carry and deploy up to 2 Mutogs for 1 space each.
Conservatory of Transmutation
Biotic conservatory that nurtures the Anointed, healing wounds and restoring vigor.
Bioflux Assimilator
A living engine graft that scavenges and metabolizes microscopic biomatter from the Mist, digesting Mist-borne organics into raw thrust.
Slowly recovers Stamina of characters on board
Junker Jet Engine
They can go on planes too! Adds +150 Speed
Omni Tank
Fill it up with anything you need to power your aircraft: gas, biomass, fissionable materials, pixie dust. Adds +1000 Range
Call Fire Support
Launches 3 guided munitions towards target area.
